title: FS 1972 Pro stars PC Set AL /NL

posts.post_title: FS 1972 Pro stars PC Set AL /NL
posts.post_content:
For Sale Complete AL / NL Pro stars Postcard sets 24 Total of the 12 NL postcards 11 are in the Hall of Fame exception is Pete Rose... and 4 AL brining total of 15 Hall of famers in the 24 card set. Overall condition is ex ex+ with only 4 exception the Lolich has a paper crease on front the Aaron has a stain and the Stargell and Torre have weak corners. Great set asking $225 delivered PM me with email if you would like more pics.
Thanks
Jonathan
The asking price is for the complete set of 24
